statements: DELETE FROM painting_competition WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM painting_competition WHERE score < 50 AND judging_criteria LIKE '%creativity%';
DELETE FROM winners WHERE prize = 'First Place';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM winners WHERE prize_amount > 500);
DELETE FROM Winners WHERE judge_id = 3 AND entry_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Entries WHERE participant_id = 1234 AND entry_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Winners WHERE judge_id = 5678 AND winning_score > 90;
